completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color R, toward the object of color B, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R one step up without overlapping and then clear the grid.
Move all objects of color R upward by one cell.
Move all the objects of color R one step up.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all isolated objects of color R upward by one cell.
Move all objects of color R one cell up.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color B, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend all objects of color R, one step upward without overlapping.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all red objects towards the closest blue object.
Move all objects of color R to the first empty row closest upward to them.
Move a neighbor object one step in the direction of the object of color R if they are neighbors, and then proceed to repaint all the objects of color R to O.
Change the color of objects in the grid to red if there is a neighboring red object.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color B, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the bottom red object up to the end of the first black object and any neighboring black objects adjacent to it.
Recolor all objects neighboring the red object to color red.
Recolor the neighbor cells of objects of color R, to R.
Update the color of the cells adjacent to the initially red cells to red themselves.
Move all objects of color R towards top neighbor of color B.
Move all objects of color R towards objects of color B if they are neighbors, then replace the position of moved R with O.
Move all objects of color R toward the objects of color B, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R up until the top of the grid.
Move all R colored objects upward.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all R objects toward the previous position and color of B objects, if they are neighbors.
Move all vertical red lines upwards, so that they replace the color of any objects they hit, and then leave empty space below them.
Move all red objects one step up.
Move all red objects one step up.
Move all objects of color R toward the center of grid.
Move the objects of color R up until they cannot move further.
Move all objects of color R up to the topmost neighboring object.
Extend the object of color R upwards without overlapping.
Move the red object to the topmost position possible.
Move the red objects one step up if they are neighbors of a blue object.
Connect all objects with color O by extending them towards the object of color R, without overlapping.
Move all red objects one step up.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color R.
Move all objects of color R upwards.
Move all objects of color R to the position of the nearest object of color different from O, and remove the original objects.
Move all objects of color R towards the topmost B object if they are neighbors.
Extend the objects of color R upwards, overlapping until edge.
Extend object of color R upward and remove trails while extending.
Extend the row of color R horizontally towards the row of color B without overlap.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all objects of color R to the next row upwards.
Move all objects of color R to the topmost empty cell directly below them.
Move all objects of color 'R' upwards, until they can move no more.
Move all objects of color R towards the closest B if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Move all objects of color R one step up.
Shift the red objects upwards.
Colorize all columns of objects in the grid with color R, starting from the bottommost row to the top.
Move all objects of color R towards the objects of color B if they are neighbors of it.
Extend the red object upwards, without overlap.
Move all instances of color R upward.
Recolor all objects of color B that are neighbors of color R objects to color R
Move all objects of color R towards the bottom of the grid, replacing their original position with the neighboring object's color.
Extend all objects of color R to the nearest neighboring object with the same orientation.
Move all objects of color R one step up if they are neighbors to an object of color B.
Move all red objects one step up.
Recolor the closest B object neighbor to an existing R object to the color R.

Move all objects of color R downwards, until they hit another object of color B.
Move all red objects upwards by one cell.
Recolor all intermediate objects in the column containing object R to color R.
Extend all red objects upward until the edge of the grid, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color R upward.
Fill all the empty spaces in the columns of color B having the same column with a color R object.
